content:
Is there some sort of special celebration going on today?
I saw Mors preparing for some kind of entrance exam.
So I guess this is how visitors celebrate the start of school.
info: 特殊反馈-开学日-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Maybe I should set up some celebration events at the amusement park...
How about calling it "Amusement Park Mock Exam"?
Gahahahaha~ ga.
info: 特殊反馈-开学日-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Even though I'm a bit confused about this whole thing,
I can only tell them the truth—
Ah, I really can't find it! Sorry about that!
info: 特殊反馈-开学日-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
On days like this,
there are fewer children at the amusement park.
Could they be off starting new adventures at school?
info: 特殊反馈-开学日-1003乐福_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
I've received quite a few calls about lost items today,
Seems like many young visitors
Left their summer homework somewhere in the park.
